price: Wọ́n wí pé: “Mímọ́ ni fún Olúwa wa, dájúdájú àwa jẹ́ alábòsí.”
arabic: قَالُواْ سُبۡحَٰنَ رَبِّنَآ إِنَّا كُنَّا ظَٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: qālū sub'ḥāna rabbinā innā kunnā ẓālimīna
